channel.title: +1 Forward - Turn
channel.description:
The newest episode of +1 Forward is out! https://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/1-forward/turn
In this one @RichRogers speaks with Brie Beau Sheldon about their slice of life, supernatural rpg of shapeshifters in a small town.
**Timecodes:** 01:23 - Read a Sitch about exploring gender in PbtA games 09:29 - Open Your Brain to Turn 20:28 - Act Under Fire with Logan Lassiter
You can find *Turn* on Beau's Itch here: https://briebeau.itch.io/turn
Or buy it on DrivethruRPG here: https://www.drivethrurpg.com/product/281964/Turn?affiliate_id=78493
